## My First Quarto Plot
This is a simple figure visualized by ggplot in Quarto

```{r}
#| label: my-first-plot
#| fig-cap: "scatterplot of square function"

library(ggplot2)

df <- data.frame(
  x = 1:10,
  y = (1:10)^2
)

ggplot(df, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point() +
  ggtitle("Square Function")
```
